data.title: James Darrell Stroud Obituary 2024
data.meta_description: James Darrell Stroud, 65, of Patrick, SC, passed away on January 12th,2024 in Patrick. Celebration of Life Ceremony will be 5pm Thursday January 25th,2024 at Norton Funeral Home...
data.text:
James Darrell Stroud, 65, of Patrick, SC, passed away on January 12th,2024 in Patrick.

Celebration of Life Ceremony will be 5pm Thursday January 25th,2024 at Norton Funeral Home. Rev. Donnie Faulkenbury will officiate. There will not be a Funeral only Ceremony, James Darrell Stroud was donated to science on January 19th to Experience Anatomy Foundation.

James Darrell Stroud was born to Jamie Stroud-Father and Ruby-Mae Stroud-Mother on May 18th,1958. He went to school at McBee High. Darrell was a happy person, a loving person, who would do anything for anyone kind of person. His love and kindness will be missed. He loved to watch VanDam karate movies, working outside and hanging out PJacks in Patrick in his spare time. He loved his children all of them in his own way. Rest In Peace “Hippie” we love you forever and always.

James Darrell Stroud is preceded in death by Ruby-Mae Stroud Mother, Jamie Stroud Father, and Darrell Bradley Stroud Son.

James Darrell Stroud is survived by Nichol Stroud Daughter, Nia Stroud Daughter, Austin Stroud Son, Stormy Singletary Daughter, Mitchell Stroud Brother, Harley Boykin (Nia), Kali Contreras (Nia), unknown grandchild (Austin), Gabriel Rivers(Stormy).

The family of James Darrell Stroud wishes to extend our sincere thanks to the Experience Anatomy Foundation, Mr. Donnie Faulkenbury-Brown Springs Baptist Church, and Norton Funeral Home, also Clyde and Robin Stroud and Faye White for helping me through all of this.

Norton Funeral Home and Crematory is honored to serve the Stroud family.
